item.title: What Your Best-Ever Feast of Tabernacles Is Missing
item.author: thecogcatholic@outlook.com (Darren)
item.description: This post is for current “Church of God” members preparing to attend the Feast of Tabernacles, a religious festival I observed for close to 30 years before I became Catholic. Every COG sermon Iâ€™ve heard about how to have the best-ever Feast of Tabernacles offers the same advice: commit to serving others. Be an usher! Be a parking lot attendant (wave those orange cones)! Help organize and decorate the meeting hall!
